hadiths.text: It was narrated from Ibn 'Abbas (concerning the Verse):"O you who believe! Obey Allah and obey the Messenger (Muhammad). That he said: This was revealed concerning 'Abdullah bin Hudhaifah bin Qais bin 'Adiyy, whom the Messenger of Allah appointed in charge of an expedition

chapter.ara-name: باب قَوْلِهِ تَعَالَى { وَأُولِي الأَمْرِ مِنْكُمْ }
chapter.eng-name: The Saying Of Allah, The Most High: "And those of you (Muslims) who are in authority
